page.title: 17TRANSPORT
page.content:
In our area we have a bus service from Monk Fryston & Hillam squares going to Leeds,Selby,Castleford,Pontefract, Sherburn, York,Goole,Hull,Fairburn, Ferrybridge.The nearest train station is at South Milford you can go as far West as Liverpool and to Hull when travelling East.Elizabeth & I went round two classes to see what vehicles their family owns. 17 families own{1 car.} 23 families own{2 cars. 4 families own{3 cars. 7 families own{1 van. 1 family owns {2 vans. 13 families own {other vehicles.
47 people owned{pedal bikes.
